meanings.definition: To feed (a person or animal) to excess.
meanings.sent1: She accidentally overfed her cat, making it sick.
meanings.sent2: The pet owner was warned not to overfeed the fish in the tank.
meanings.sent3: The dog looked at the overflowing food bowl, wondering if it was a prank of overfeeding.
meanings.sent4: The garden was overfed with fertilizer, causing the plants to wither.
meanings.sent5: The image of the bloated squirrel served as a cautionary tale against overfeeding.

meanings.definition: The act of feeding (a person or animal) to excess.
meanings.sent1: Overfeeding can lead to health problems in pets.
meanings.sent2: The overfeeding of the baby bird was unintentional.
meanings.sent3: The overfeeding of compliments made her blush with embarrassment.
meanings.sent4: The overfeeding of information overwhelmed the students.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of overfeeding were evident in the chubby puppy.
